dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Impressive... I expected no less of the Red Gaze’s underlings.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Oh boy, there goes Hopkins and his big mouth... Lemme apologize in his stead~ Heheh.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: What’s taking you so long though, Hopkins? Hemorrhoids acting up again?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: W-what are you talking about?! I've never had—
Hopkins slowly got to his feet after fidgeting for a moment.
I noticed that his pockets were stuffed full, but I didn't bother to point it out.
